name: Updating a program recalculates intervals
description:
As a TV scheduling system
I want to automatically calculate 15-minute intervals for programs
So that I can track program duration in standardized time blocks
descriptionHtml:
As a TV scheduling system
I want to automatically calculate 15-minute intervals for programs
So that I can track program duration in standardized time blocks
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected 2 intervals for 'Test Show', got 3
assert 3 == 2

test_tv_intervals.py:151: in check_program_intervals

E   AssertionError: Expected 2 intervals for 'Test Show', got 3
E   assert 3 == 2

steps.name: Given I have a program "Test Show" that runs from "10:00" to "10:30"
When I insert the program into the database
Then the program "Test Show" should have 2 intervals
